Troopers can only use Zero Pain if at least one of these is true:
* They are the Active Trooper.
* {{originalhighlight}}In the Reactive Turn, they have a valid [[ARO]], or are targeted by a [[Comms Attack]].

{{effects}}
* '''In the Active or Reactive Turn''', this Program allows the user to make '''two''' WIP Rolls in a Face to Face Roll to evade all enemy [[Comms Attacks]].
* A -3 WIP MOD is applied to the enemy Comms Attacks. 
* If the user wins with either Roll, they nullify the Comms Attack against them and avoid all Damage and special effects from the Attack.
